entries: +26, {@skill Religion} +22, {@skill Stealth} +22 Str –5, Dex +4, Con +0, Int +5, Wis +4, Cha +7.
top.name: Occultism

entries: Belcorra can sense the presence of magic auras as though she were always using a 1st-level {@spell detect magic} spell. When she Seeks, she gains the benefits of a 3rd-level {@spell detect magic} spell on things she sees.
top.name: Magic Sense

traits: lowest three levels of the abomination vaults
top.name: Site Bound

entries: Belcorra is destroyed, she re-forms in {@dice 2d4} days within the.
mid.name: When

entries: (though she can reduce that time by empowering herself with glimmers of {@deity Nhimbaloth|LOGM}'s essence using.
mid.name: Empty Vault

entries: ). Belcorra can only be permanently destroyed if she enacts her full revenge on Absalom or if {@deity Nhimbaloth|LOGM} devours her soul.
mid.name: the Ebon Fulcrum Lens

entries: Each time Belcorra casts a sorcerer bloodline spell or an aberrant bloodline granted spell, she can grant herself or a target of the spell a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws for 1 round.
bot.name: Blood Magic

entries: Belcorra stares at a creature she can see within 30 feet. The target takes {@damage 9d6} mental damage (DC 33 basic Will save). A creature that fails its save is also {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 1} for 1 minute.
bot.name: Corrupting Gaze

entries: Belcorra extends her presence throughout the lowest three levels of Gauntlight until the end of her next turn. She can see with the benefits of all-around vision and can make ghostly hand attacks or use special abilities originating from any surface in this area.
bot.name: Haunted Lighthouse

entries: Belcorra's next action is to cast a sorcerer spell of 4th level or lower, she reduces the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action).
bot.name: If

mid.trigger: An enemy is about to damage the cavern seer with bludgeoning damage or with a spell that has the {@trait earth} trait
entries: The cavern seer gains resistance 10 against the triggering damage.
mid.name: Stone Defense

entries: Pebbles and dust rise from the stone to impede vision. The cavern seer and their allies within 60 feet become {@condition concealed} for 1 minute. This concealment can't be used to {@action Hide} or {@action Sneak}.
bot.name: Cavern Distortion

entries: The cavern seer ignores difficult terrain while underground.
bot.name: Underground Stride

entries: When a bright walker is reduced to 0 Hit Points, they flash out in a burst of light, obtaining the blazing end they were denied at death. This blaze deals {@damage 10d6} fire damage (DC 25 basic Reflex save) to creatures within 20 feet. Creatures who fail this save are also {@condition dazzled} for 1 minute ({@condition blinded} for 1 minute on a critical failure).
mid.name: Bright Release

entries: 30 feet. The bright walker sheds bright light. Any creature that starts its turn in the aura must attempt at a DC 24 Fortitude save.

entries.Critical Success: The creature is temporarily immune for 24 hours.
entries.Success: The creature is {@condition dazzled} for 1 round.
entries.Failure: The creature is {@condition blinded} for 1 round.
entries.Critical Failure: The creature is {@condition blinded} for 1 hour.

mid.name: Light Aura

entries: The bright walker suppresses their light aura for 1 round, reducing it to a faint, ghostly glow of dim light.
mid.name: Suppress Aura

entries: A bright walker can't fly higher than 1 foot above the ground. If they fly higher than this distance, they fall but don't take any damage from falling.
bot.name: Landbound

entries: Aura is suppressed; The bright walker reignites their Light Aura with a burst of brightness that deals {@damage 5d6} fire damage (DC 25 basic Reflex save) to creatures within a 20-foot burst. Creatures who are {@condition dazzled} or with light blindness find this flare particularly painful; such a creature's save result is one degree of success worse than the result it rolled.
bot.name: Light

bot.requirements: The bright walker's Light Aura is suppressed
entries: The bright walker teleports to a square it can see within 60 feet that is not in an area of bright light. The bright walker can't use Shadow Jump again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Shadow Jump

entries: +17, {@skill Survival} +16 Str +4, Dex +5, Con +1, Int –1, Wis +2, Cha +2 Items black smear poison (2 doses; Pathfinder Bestiary 51), chainmail, shortbow (20 arrows)
top.name: Stealth

entries: When the caligni defender rolls a success on a Will save against a {@trait fear} effect, they get a critical success instead. In addition, any time they gain the {@condition frightened} condition, reduce its value by 1.
mid.name: Bravery

entries: When the caligni defender dies, their body combusts in a flash of white-hot flame. All creatures in a 20-foot burst take {@damage 6d10} fire damage (DC 26 basic Reflex save). Their gear and treasure are unaffected by the flames and are left in a pile where they died.
mid.name: Death Flame

entries: When adjacent to one or more defenders they can see, the defender deals an additional {@dice 2d6} damage with their Strikes.
bot.name: Shoulder to Shoulder

entries: A deepwater dhuthorex deals 7 piercing damage to its target if its jaws {@action Strike} is a failure (but not a critical failure).
bot.name: Overpowering Jaws

entries: Medium, {@damage 2d6+7} bludgeoning plus {@damage 2d6} acid, Rupture 20.
bot.name: Swallow Whole

entries: The puffball senses motion through vibration and air movement.
top.name: Motion Sense

entries: When the dragon's blood puffball dies, it explodes, dealing {@damage 7d8} poison damage to each creature in a 20-foot emanation (DC 26 basic Fortitude save).
mid.name: Spore Explosion

entries: 60 feet, DC 27.
mid.name: Frightful Presence

entries: As deepwater dhuthorex, but 8 piercing damage.
bot.name: Overpowering Jaws
entries_as_xyz: A deepwater dhuthorex deals 7 piercing damage to its target if its jaws {@action Strike} is a failure (but not a critical failure).

entries: Large, {@damage 3d6+8} bludgeoning plus {@damage 2d6} acid, Rupture 23.
bot.name: Swallow Whole

entries: 20 feet. A dread wisp, though naturally {@condition invisible}, glows with a grayish illumination, casting dim light in the aura and making them visible. Living creatures that end their turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 25 Will saving throw or become {@condition frightened|CRB|frightened 1} (or {@condition frightened|CRB|frightened 2} on a critical failure)
Those that critically succeed are temporarily immune for 10 minutes.
mid.name: Dread Flickering

entries: A dread wisp is immune to all spells except faerie fire, magic missile, maze, searing light, and spells with the {@trait positive} trait.
mid.name: Magic Immunity

bot.requirements: An enemy within 15 feet of the dread wisp is under a {@trait fear} effect, {@condition drained}, or {@condition dying}
entries: The dread wisp feeds on the creature's despair. The dread wisp regains {@dice 2d8} Hit Points and deals {@damage 3d8} negative damage to the creature (DC 25 basic Fortitude save), and if the dread wisp has Gone Dark, their Dread Flickering reignites.
bot.name: Feed on Despair

entries: The dread wisp extinguishes their Dread Flickering, becoming {@condition invisible}. They can end this effect with another use of this action. If the dread wisp uses their draining touch {@action Strike} while {@condition invisible}, the arc of pale energy lets any observer determine their location, making them {@condition hidden} to all observers only until the dread wisp moves.
bot.name: Go Dark

entries: The dread wisp teleports to a square they can see within 30 feet that isn't in an area of bright light. The dread wisp can't use Shadow Flitter again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Shadow Flitter

entries: If the dread wisp critically hits with their draining touch {@action Strike}, the target is {@condition drained|CRB|drained 1}.
bot.name: Wearying Touch

entries: +16 (+18 to {@action Subsist}) Str +3, Dex +4, Con +2, Int +0, Wis +3, Cha +1 Items chain shirt, +1 composite longbow (20 arrows), longsword.
top.name: Survival

entries: When the hunter rolls a success on a Reflex save, they get a critical success instead.
mid.name: Deft Evasion

bot.prerequisites: The hunter is wielding a ranged weapon with a reload of 0
entries: The hunter makes two ranged Strikes against their prey. If both hit and deal damage, the target takes an additional {@damage 1d8} {@condition persistent damage ||persistent bleed damage}.
bot.name: Hunter's Wound

entries: The hunter can {@action Step} and then {@action Strike}, or {@action Strike} and then {@action Step}.
bot.name: Skirmish Strike

entries: +17 Str +2, Dex +5, Con +1, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha +2 Items +1 repeating hand crossbow (4 magazines; page 73), rapier, shootist bandolier (page 73), stupor poison (4; page 74), studded leather armor.
top.name: Thievery

entries: The shootist rerolls the save and uses the better result.
mid.name: Shootist's Luck

entries: The shootist takes aim and makes a ranged {@action Strike}. If the attack hits and deals damage, the target is {@condition flat-footed} until the end of the shootist's turn, or until the end of the shootist's next turn on a critical hit.
bot.name: Distracting Shot

bot.requirements: The shootist is holding an unloaded repeating hand crossbow
entries: The shootist Interacts to reload the repeating hand crossbow and Strikes with it.
bot.name: Reloading Trick

entries: The shootist Interacts to draw a repeating hand crossbow and Strikes with it, or Strikes with a loaded repeating hand crossbow they're holding then Interacts to stow it.
bot.name: Shootist's Draw

entries: The shootist deals an extra {@damage 2d6} precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak Attack

entries: A target damaged by the warden's melee {@action Strike} must succeed at a DC 21 Fortitude save or be {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} until the end of the warden's next turn.
bot.name: Hampering Slash

entries: A warden deals an extra {@dice 1d6} damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak Attack

entries: When Dulac dies, her body is destroyed in a burst of chilling shadows. All creatures in a 20-foot burst take {@damage 8d8} cold damage (DC 28 basic Reflex save). Dulac's gear and treasure are unaffected by the shadows and are left in a pile where she died.
mid.name: Death Shadows

mid.trigger: A {@condition dazzled} or {@condition blinded} creature, or a creature with light blindness, ends its move adjacent to Dulac
entries: Dulac {@action Step||Steps}.
mid.name: Opportune Step

entries: Dulac's reach is targeted with a ranged or melee attack by an attacker she can see; The ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack, and the ally can {@action Step} after the attack.
mid.name: Warding Shove

entries: Attack Dulac deals an additional {@damage 1d6} precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak

entries: 30 feet. A creature that begins its turn within the area feels as if its lungs were filling with water and must succeed at a DC 28 Fortitude save or be unable to speak or breathe. The creature can still hold its breath and can attempt a new save at the end of its turn. A creature that succeeds is temporarily immune for 24 hours.
mid.name: Breath of the Bog

mid.trigger: A creature walks on top of a bog mummy that lies buried in the mud or peat below
mid.requirements: Initiative has not yet been rolled
entries: The bog mummy automatically notices the creature and Burrows before rolling initiative.
mid.name: Rise Up

bot.name: Bog Rot
bot.note:
This
affliction can't be reduced below stage 1, nor can the
damage from it be healed, until it's successfully treated
with remove curse or a similar effect; the affliction can
then be removed as normal for a disease. A creature
killed by bog rot melts into a noxious sludge and can't
be resurrected except by a 7th-level resurrect ritual or
similar magic

entries: +20, {@skill Stealth} +20 Str +2, Dex +5, Con +0, Int +1, Wis +3, Cha +5 Items dagger, wand of continuation (stoneskin)
top.name: Diplomacy

entries: When Galudu dies, her body explodes into brilliant motes of magical energy. All creatures in a 20-foot burst take {@damage 12d6} force damage (DC 30 basic Reflex save). Galudu's gear is unaffected by the explosion and is left in a pile where she died.
mid.name: Death Motes

mid.trigger: A {@condition dazzled} or {@condition blinded} creature, or a creature with light blindness, ends its move adjacent to Galudu.
entries: Galudu {@action Step||Steps}.
mid.name: Opportune Step

entries: acid splash, daze, message, ray of frost, shield.
bot.name: Cantrips

entries: Attack Galudu deals an additional {@damage 3d6} precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak

entries: A creature that eats food conjured by Galudu's {@spell create food} spell regains {@dice 4d4} Hit.
bot.name: Survivor's Nourishment

entries: A creature can only benefit from this healing once per week.
bot.name: Points.

entries: When Khurfel dies, his {@condition invisible} flesh quickly rots away and sublimates into a foul-smelling gas that fills a 10-foot emanation around his body. The gas deals {@damage 10d6} negative damage to creatures in this area as their flesh too curdles and rots (DC 28 basic Fortitude save).
mid.name: Necrotic Decay

entries: Khurfel makes one rhoka sword {@action Strike} and two jaws Strikes against one or two different creatures (splitting up the attacks any way he wishes)
His multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all three attacks.
bot.name: Frenzied Attack

entries: Khurfel makes a melee weapon {@action Strike}.
On this {@action Strike}, he gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignores any concealment the target has.
bot.name: Insightful Swing

bot.requirements: Khurfel damaged a creature with a jaws {@action Strike} on his last action
entries: Khurfel maintains contact, turning the creature's flesh translucent around the injury. Khurfel chooses one of two options, each of which requires a DC 28 Fortitude save. If the jaws {@action Strike} was a critical hit, the creature suffers both effects, using the same save result for both.

items: {@bold Drain Blood} Khurfel drinks some of the creature's blood. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition drained|CRB|drained 1} and Khurfel regains 10 HP (or, on a critical failure, it's {@condition drained|CRB|drained 2} and Khurfel regains 20 HP).

{@bold Drain Vitality} (necromancy) Khurfel draws out some of the creature's vital essence. The creature becomes {@condition enfeebled|CRB|enfeebled 1} for 1 hour on a failed save (or {@condition enfeebled|CRB|enfeebled 2} for 1 hour on a critical failure).

bot.name: Wicked Bite

entries: 30 feet. Drow around Quara are heartened by her presence. Her drow allies in the aura gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.
mid.name: Commanding Aura

entries: Quara isn't {@condition flat-footed} to {@condition hidden}, {@condition undetected}, or flanking creatures of 11th level or lower, or to creatures of 11th level or lower using Surprise.

entries: Salaisa {@action Stride||Strides} up to her Speed. She can make up to three longsword Strikes at any point during this movement, each against a different target within reach. These attacks count toward her multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after she makes all of her attacks. If she moves half her speed or less during Storm of Blades, that movement doesn't trigger reactions.
